lst.name: sentence
lst.str: And in my personal opinion I think it would be a very big mistake to put a damper on this positive growth or developments by imposing such a tax," Hofer said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A proposed sales tax on gold transactions could put a damper on the Tokyo market and encourage a shift of trading to Hong Kong and Singapore, senior vice president and Tokyo branch manager of Credit Suisse Paul Hofer told a press conference.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Officials of several major Japanese trading houses, attending the press conference, said they supported Credit Suisse's call for the government not to impose the gold tax.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: And in my personal opinion I think it would be a very big mistake to put a damper on this positive growth or developments by imposing such a tax," Hofer said.
